entry.title: $2500 // Amazing deal for a 2 bed / 1 bath with balcony in Bed-Stuy.
entry.content:
Ref#22567

Living in brand new building, steps to everything you needed. Apartment has good size living room with natural light. All bedrooms are equal size, come with windows and closet. One room has balcony. Building has furnished roof with Manhattan view. Good deal! Please text to setup the viewing.

entry.title: $2585 // Best space available in Bushwick ----- 4 bed windows in all rooms!
entry.content:
Spacious and under budget 4br apt - This apt is located on the 4th floor of walkup - Large common space - Separate kitchen with stainless appliances, dishwasher, and lots of cabin and countertop space - Three full sized bedrooms with windows, and one super large queen sized bedroom - Good amount of closet space throughout - Located just a few blocks from JMZ stations. (Net Price advertised)

Call or text us today ---- > nine * 1 *7 *34 *five *four __1_ zero___four

entry.title: $2550 // Beautiful, Light-filled Apt in Bushwick
entry.content:
Lovely, bright and spacious 3br apartment!

Large bedrooms with big windows and closets, room for a queen-sized bed and a dresser.

The apartment is freshly painted with hardwood floors and a big living room area.

There's also an awesome ROOFTOP with a spectacular view of the Empire State Building! It's perfect for sunbathing and hanging out in the summer.

Amazing price for the location! Prime Bushwick neighborhood close to restaurants, bars, laundry and grocery stores.

* Only 1 block from the L train at Montrose, 10 min walk to J/M at Flushing

Please email to set up a viewing today!

*Decent income/credit required
Must sign lease
Guarantors accepted
International accepted
